item.description:
In this meetups, we'll talk about how to read nutrition labels, how to do smart food shopping, and learn how to avoid FDA scams.

Look in your kitchen and see if you are eating foods made with Monosodium Glutamate, Potassium Bromate, or Sodium Nitrite. Does it sound like you have to be a chemist to understand these?

It's simpler than you think!

We will talk about food safety, discuss different diets, and share healthy recipes.

 

When: Friday, April 5

Time: 6-8pm

Price: $15

What to bring: Attendees can bring food items that they use regularly and we can go over the labels. They can bring their favorite healthy recipes to share.  Thank you!

Presenter: Dr. Abbey Denaro.

She is a Chiropractor and Personal Trainer with degrees in Exercise Physiology and Nutrition.
item.name: Nutrition Labels 101
